title: Council Decision of 23 February 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 23 February 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training (98/C 69/05)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Dr Jorge NUNES DE OLIVEIRA is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training in place of Dr Joaquim DE SOUSA GOMES CARNEIRO for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which expires on 22 July 1999.
attachments:
Done in Brussels, 23 February 1998.
For the Council
The President
R. COOK
(1) OJ L 253, 24.9.1985, p. 43.
(2) OJ C 239, 17.8.1996, p. 5.
